text: Meghan Ory (born August 20, 1982) is a Canadian actress. She is best known for her role as Red Riding Hood/Ruby on the ABC fantasy series Once Upon a Time. She also starred in the CBS drama Intelligence as Riley Neal. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from British Columbia
title: Meghan Ory
